name: ticket
description: Durable project planning with file-based tickets stored in .tickets/. Use for work spanning multiple sessions. Tickets persist across context handoffs and enable dependency tracking between tasks.

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The tk command: create (new ticket), start (begin work), close (complete), ls (list open), ready (show unblocked), blocked (show blocked), show (display ticket), dep (add dependency), add-note (append note)

parameters.name: arg1
parameters.description: First argument. For 'create': quoted title. For 'start/close/show': ticket ID. For 'dep': ticket that depends. For 'add-note': ticket ID.

parameters.name: arg2
parameters.description: Second argument. For 'create': -d 'description' or -t type. For 'dep': the dependency ID. For 'add-note': quoted note text.

parameters.name: arg3
parameters.description: Third argument. For 'create': additional flag like -t task or -p 1.

parameters.name: arg4
parameters.description: Fourth argument. For 'create': additional flag like --tags auth,api.

parameters.name: arg5
parameters.description: Fifth argument. For 'create': additional flag like --parent epic-id.
